TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StoreLocation extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 X.509 憑證存放區的位置。

span.span: Specifies the location of the X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別搭配建構函式。This enumeration is used with the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它會假設您有三個憑證，可以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation CurrentUser = int32(1)

summary.span: 目前使用者使用的 X.509 憑證存放區。

span.span: The X.509 certificate store used by the current user.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它會假設您有三個憑證，可以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation LocalMachine = int32(2)

summary.span: 指派至本機電腦的 X.509 憑證存放區。

span.span: The X.509 certificate store assigned to the local machine.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它會假設您有三個憑證，可以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]
